label: 藤原公任
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This son of the prime minister Yoritada (924-89) was known as a great scholar, and became one of the greatest poets, compilers and theoreticians of poetry in the Heian era, dying in 1041 at the age of 75.
